root.name: Stunt GP
root.description: Stunt GP is an arcade RC-controlled car racing game with a stunts mechanic as a focus. Performing flips, corkscrews, spins and jumps earns you 'Aeromiles' that can be used to purchase upgrades for your car. There are 16 unlockable cars and 24 different tracks in 6 environments. In addition to a racing career progression, there is an arcade mode (single race), freestyle mode and time trial. A stunt mode is available for both singleplayer and multiplayer. The multiplayer supports either 2 player splitscreen or up to 4 players through a network connection.
